mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_club join tb_board using(board_no) where board_delete = 'N'

select club_name, board_no, club_intro, club_plan, club_place, club_etc, max_people, end_yn, file_name from tb_club join tb_board using(board_no) left join tb_file using(board_no) where board_delete = 'N' and club_name = '${ clubName }'
